titles: Here begynneth the booke whiche is called the body of polycye And it speketh of vertues and of good maners, and the sayd boke is deuyded in thre partyes. The fyrst party is adressed to prynces. The seconde to knyghtes and nobles: and the thyrde to the vnyuersal people. The fyrst chapytre speketh of the dyscrypcyon of the body of polycye.
author: Christine, de Pisan, ca. 1364-ca. 1431.
date: In the yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC.xxi. The xiii. yere of the reygne of kynge Henry the. viii. The. xvii daye of Maye. [1521]]
publisher: Without Newe gate in saynt Pulkers parysshe by Ioh[a] Skot,
notes: A translation of Christine de Pisan's Le livre du corps de policie.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Education of princes --  Early works to 1800.
